title: E-Commerce Platform
description: A full-stack e-commerce solution built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, payment processing, inventory management, and real-time order tracking.

title: Brand Identity Design
description: Complete brand identity package for a tech startup including logo design, color palette, typography, business cards, and brand guidelines. Modern and minimalist approach.

title: AI Chatbot Assistant
description: Intelligent chatbot using natural language processing and machine learning. Built with Python, TensorFlow, and integrated with multiple messaging platforms.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Responsive portfolio website with modern animations, smooth scrolling, and dynamic content loading. Built with vanilla JavaScript and CSS Grid.

title: Mobile App UI Design
description: Clean and intuitive mobile app interface design for a fitness tracking application. Includes wireframes, prototypes, and user flow diagrams.

title: Data Analytics Dashboard
description: Python-based data visualization and analysis tool with interactive charts, real-time data processing, and machine learning insights for business intelligence.

title: Social Media Platform
description: Full-featured social media platform with real-time messaging, photo sharing, user profiles, and news feed. Built with React, Express.js, and Socket.io.

title: Logo Collection
description: Collection of creative logos designed for various clients across different industries. Showcasing versatility in design styles and brand representation.

title: Machine Learning Model
description: Predictive machine learning model for stock market analysis using Python, scikit-learn, and TensorFlow. Includes data preprocessing and model evaluation.

title: Task Management App
description: Collaborative task management application with drag-and-drop functionality, team collaboration features, and progress tracking. Built with Vue.js and Firebase.

title: Website Redesign
description: Complete website redesign project focusing on improved user experience, modern aesthetics, and mobile responsiveness. Includes user research and A/B testing.

title: Computer Vision App
description: Computer vision application for object detection and recognition using OpenCV and deep learning. Real-time processing with high accuracy rates.
